title: Possible Typo in Code of Conduct
body:
Context: https://github.com/golang/go/blob/aa487e66f869785837275ee20441a53888a51bb2/doc/conduct.html#L162

The spelling `wilful` is non-American, and as far as I know we default to American spelling (ie. `willful`).

*note: As an Australian I prefer `willful`, just thinking about what the right thing for the repository is*
